src:
REZZIME DANA (utorak): Napoli i Barsa uprskali stvar
Pogledajte ko vam je 5. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

05 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO


LIVERPUL - GENK (tip 1, kvota 1,10) - rezultat 2:1

Na Enfuldu u Liverpulu šampion Evrope je samo odradio posao protiv prvaka Belgije. Genk se ispirsio koliko je mogao, ali je kombinovani sastav Jirgena Klopa bio dovoljno skoncentrisan da ne dozvoli nikakvo iznenađenje. Pobedili su sa 2:1. Posle četiri odigrana kola Liverpul je prvi sa devet bodova, dok Napoli ima osam, a definitivna odluka o pobedniku grupe će pasti verovatno u sledećem kolu kada na Enfildu igraju upravo ovi rivali.
Opširnije pročitajte OVDE.

DORTMUND - INTER (tip 1, kvota 2,25) - rezultat 3:2

Inter se preporodio dolaskom Antonija Kontea, koji je ekspesno uspeo da ukomponuje kvalitetna pojačanja od prošlog leta, ali u ovom trenutku Nerazuri nemaju dovoljno snage da iznesu čitav meč protiv ekiupa najvišeg evropskog ranga. To je bilo protiv Barselone i Juventusa, tako je bilo i večeras u Dortmundu, gde su do 51. minuta vodili sa 2:0, ali su na kraju doživeli zasluženi poraz.
Opširnije pročitajte OVDE.

VALENSIJA - LIL (tip 1, kvota 1,95) - rezultat 4:1

Valensija se mučila u prvom poluvremenu sudara sa Lilom, Viktor Osimhen je i pogodio za 1:0 Francuza, ali u poslednja 24 minuta regularnog toka meča rapsodija Slepih miševa. Krenulo je sa iskupljenjem Danija Pareha, krivca za Lilov jedini gol, a nastavilo autogolom Adama Sumaora, te pogocima Žofrija Kondogbije i Ferana Toresa za konačnih 4:1 na Mestalji.

LION - BENFIKA (tip 1, kvota 1,90)- rezultat 3:1

Lion je odradio najveći deo posla već u prvom poluvremenu, kada je vodi sa 2:0 golovima Andersena i Depaja. Seferović je gostima vratio nadu golom u 76. minutu, ali je sve i definitivno bilo rešeno u 89. minutu kada je traore postavio konačan rezultat utakmice.

ZENIT - LAJPCIG (tip 2, kvota 2,45) - rezultat 0:2

Strojevim korakom Lajpcig je promarširao kroz Sankt Peterburg i trijumfom nad Zenitom od 2:0 i trećom pobedom stigao na korak od plasmana u osminu finala Lige šampiona, ujedeno i najvećeg uspeha na međunarodnoj sceni u istoriji kluba osnovanog relativno skoro.
Opširnije pročitajte OVDE.

PORTSMUT - SAUTEND (tip 1, kvota 1,38) - rezultat 4:1

Portsmut je postigao prvi gol u nadoknadi prvog poluvremena, a onda je u nastavku u još tri navrata pogađao mrežu Sautenda. Maris je doveo domaće u vođstvo, a prednost je duplirao Harison u 50. minutu. Gudšip je meč učinio nezvesnim u 69. minutu, ali su Harison i Harns u samom finišu razrešili svaku dilemu.

ROČDEJL - IPSVIČ (tip 2, kvota 1,95) - rezultat 0:1

Ipsvič nije previše blistao, ali je u pravom trenutku došao do prednosti i razrešio pitanje pobednika na ovom gostovanju. Igrač odluke bio je Deni Rouvi, koji je mrežu domaćina pogodio u 53. minutu. Sautend je u finišu pokušao da dođe do izjednačenja, ali nije uspeo.

PRECRTANO


NAPOLI - SALCBURG (tip 1, kvota 1,80) - rezultat 1:1

Napoli je na iskustvo sačuvao bod protiv Austrijanaca i približio se drugoj fazi, ali se pre svega očekivao kec. Salcburgu svaka čast, on je remizirao večeras na San Paolu (1:1) gde je igrao hrabro i napadački, a ukoliko kao što se očekuje završi na kraju u Ligi Evrope kao trećeplasirani iz ove grupe moćiće da se pohvali da ima najboljeg strelca grupne faze Lige šampiona.
Opširnije pročitajte OVDE.

BARSELONA - SLAVIJA PRAG (tip 1, kvota 1,25) - rezultat 0:0

Svaka čast Dinamu na onih 4:0 protiv Atalante, ali ovo što je Slavija večeras uradila Kataloncima ama baš niko nije očekivao. Na stranu sad ne baš impresivne partije izabranika Ernesta Valverdea u prvenstvu Španije, fudbalska planeta je bila ubeđena da će Blaugrana pregaziti Slaviju, posebno nakon kritika posle prve utakmice u Pragu.
Opširnije pročitajte OVDE.

ČELSI - AJAKS (tip 1, kvota 1,90) - rezultat 4:4

Čelsi se klatio na konopcima. A onda se nezamislivo dogodilo. Gosti iz Holandije sve su izgubili u jednom napadu. Ne, nije greška, u jednom napadu. Na stranu sad gol Cezara Aspilikuete za 2:4 u 63. minutu, ova šizofrena utakmica odlučena je kada su u jednom Čelsijevom napadu crvene kartone zaradili i Dejli Blind i Joel Veltman, a Žoržinjo dobio šansu da sa kreča smanji zaostatak na 3:4. Sa devetoricom na terenu Ajaks nije izdržao. U najluđoj utakmici dosadašnjeg toka sezone 4:4 u Londonu!
text:
DAILY SUMMARY (Tuesday): Napoli and Barsa blew the thing
Look who brought you money on November 5, and who sold you ...

05 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED


LIVERPUL - GENK (Type 1, Odds 1.10) - Result 2: 1

At Enfuld in Liverpool, the European champion just did the job against the Belgian champions. Genk scrambled as far as he could, but Jirgen Klop's combined composition was concentrated enough to allow no surprise. They won by 2: 1. After four games played, Liverpool are first with nine points, while Napoli have eight, and the definitive decision on the winner of the group will probably fall in the next round when these rivals play at Enfield.
Read more HERE.

DORTMUND - INTER (Type 1, odds 2.25) - Result 3: 2

Inter rebounded with the arrival of Antonio Conte, who has been able to blend in with quality reinforcements since last summer, but at this point the Nerazurs do not have the strength to put up an entire match against top European teams. It was against Barcelona and Juventus, so it was tonight in Dortmund, where they led by 2: 0 with 51 minutes left, but eventually suffered a well-deserved defeat.
Read more HERE.

VALENCIA - LIL (tip 1, odds 1,95) - result 4: 1

Valencia struggled in the first half of the collision with Lille, Victor Ouschenhen hit 1-0 for the French, but in the last 24 minutes of the regular flow of the match Rhapsody of the Bats. It began with the redemption of Danny Pareh, the culprit for Lil's only goal, and continued with a goal by Adam Sumaor, and a shot by Joffrey Condogbia and Feran Torres for the final 4-1 at Mestalja.

LION - BENFIKA (tip 1, odds 1,90) - result 3: 1

Lyon did most of the work early in the first half, leading it with 2-0 goals from Andersen and Depai. Seferovic gave the visitors hope of the goal in the 76th minute, but everything was definitely resolved in the 89th minute when traore set the final result of the match.

Zenit - Leipzig (type 2, odds 2.45) - result 0: 2

By machine, Leipzig marched through St. Petersburg and with a 3-0 triumph over Zenit and a third victory, he made it to the eighth Champions League final, the biggest success on the international stage in the history of the club, founded relatively recently.
Read more HERE.

PORTSMUT - SAUTEND (type 1, odds 1,38) - result 4: 1

Portsmouth scored the first goal of the first half and then hit the Southend network three more times. Maris brought the home side in the lead, with the lead double to Harrison in the 50th minute. Goodshipp made the match unconscious in the 69th minute, but Harrison and Harns solved every dilemma in the finish.

ROCHDALE - IPSVICH (tip 2, odds 1,95) - result 0: 1

Ipswich did not shine too much, but at the right moment he came to the advantage and settled the question of the winners in this away game. The decider was Danny Rouvi, who hit the home side in the 53rd minute. Southend attempted a draw in the finish but failed.

PRECRTANO


NAPOLI - SALCBURG (Type 1, odds 1.80) - Score 1: 1

Napoli saved the point against the Austrians in the experience and came close to the second stage, but first of all, an ace was expected. He saluted Salzburg with honor, tonight he played at San Paolo (1: 1) where he played bravely and offensively, and if expected to end up in the Europa League as third-placed from this group he will be able to boast of having the best group stage scorer Champions League.
Read more HERE.

BARCELONA - SLAVIA PRAGUE (tip 1, odds 1,25) - result 0: 0

All the credit to Dinamo for those 4-0 against Atalanta, but what Slavia did to the Catalans tonight was not expected by anyone. On the side of the now not very impressive pick of Ernest Valverde in the Spanish Championship, the football planet was convinced that Blaugrana would overtake Slavia, especially after criticism after the first game in Prague.
Read more HERE.

Chelsea - AJAKS (tip 1, odds 1,90) - result 4: 4

Chelsea was swinging on the ropes. And then the unthinkable happened. The Dutch guests lost everything in one attack. No, it's not a mistake, in one attack. On the side of Caesar Aspilicueta's goal now 2: 4 in the 63rd minute, this schizophrenic game was decided when, in a single Chelsea attack, red cards were earned by Daily Blind and Joel Veltman, and Georgino got a chance to reduce the backlog to 3: 4. With nine in the field, Ajax could not stand. In the craziest game so far of the season 4: 4 in London!
